name: Reusable Cup
description:
Drive, fight and repeat until you're the true owner of the Reusable Cup.

Game made in one week by me (as developer, graphic artist and creating the music) for the Genre Mash Jam (with the Reusable theme).

First time doing graphics and second time doing music, so they have a lot of room for improvement.

Have fun!

Controls:

Move the car with WASD or directional arrows.

Use the in screen buttons for the RPG battles.
